about_the_game:
Content Highlights:
  • Character Introductions: Comprehensive profiles and background information for all the characters featured in the game.
  • Battle Illustrations at All 'Burst Clothing' Stages: Stunning artwork showcasing the characters in various 'Burst Clothing' states during intense battles.
  • Burst Clothing' and H-Scenes with Variations: Exploring the provocative 'Burst Clothing' moments and intimate H-scenes with multiple variations and outcomes.
  • Memorable Dialogues: A nostalgic look back at some of the most memorable and impactful dialogues from the game.
  • Initial Character Designs: Early concept art and designs that showcase the development process of the characters before their final iterations.
  • Background Art: Immersive and intricate artwork depicting the captivating world and environments of the game.
  • Cover Art Creation Process: An in-depth look into the creative process behind designing the captivating cover art for the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The characters depicted are all adults. It contains explicit adult themes, including female nudity, erotic content, mild violence, and non-consensual sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

Content Highlights:

name: Kon's Lesson! Collector's edition

subs.option_text: 妖狐的戀愛學程美術集 - $3.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel Graphics
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11

csrr.descriptors: 成人內容，未滿十八歲禁止遊玩。

short_description: The digital artbook for "Kon's Lesson!" features an extensive collection of character illustrations, sketches, and scene artwork from the game, along with early character concepts that did not make it into the final release.
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
